DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine if PF-04802540 decreases REM sleep.
DOC.brief_title: A Study Of The Effect Of PF-04802540 On Sleep Measures
DOC.criteria: Healthy male and/or female (nonchildbearing potential) subjects between the ages of 18 and 55 years, inclusive Body Mass Index (BMI) between 18 to 32 kg/m2, inclusive, and a total body weight >45 kg (99 lbs) Nonusers of nicotine Evidence or history of clinically significant medical illness A history of seizures, including childhood febrile seizures Any condition possibly affecting drug absorption
